price: Ni leurs bien, ni leurs enfants ne leur seront d’aucune utilité contre la [punition] d’Allah. Ce sont les gens du Feu où ils demeureront éternellement.
arabic: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
